TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSDualHttpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public Class WSDualHttpBinding Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences
type WSDualHttpBinding = class inherit Binding interface IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 設計搭配雙工服務合約使用，可讓服務和用戶端傳送及接收訊息的安全與互通繫結。

span.span: A secure and interoperable binding that is designed for use with duplex service contracts that allows both services and clients to send and receive messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供與 相同的 Web 服務通訊協定支援，但是要搭配雙工合約使用。The provides the same support for Web Service protocols as the , but for use with duplex contracts. 只支援 SOAP 安全性，而且需要可靠傳訊。 only supports SOAP security and requires reliable messaging. 這個繫結要求用戶端擁有針對服務提供回呼端點的公用 URI，This binding requires that the client has a public URI that provides a callback endpoint for the service. 而 URI 則是由 提供。This is provided by the . 雙重繫結會向服務公開用戶端的 IP 位址，A dual binding exposes the IP address of the client to the service. 用戶端應該使用安全性確保本身只連接其信任的服務。The client should use security to ensure that it only connects to services it trusts. 根據預設， 會產生下列繫結項目堆疊：By default the generates the following binding element stack: - - - - - - - ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在組態檔中指定 `wsDualHttpBinding` 繫結。The following example shows how to specify the `wsDualHttpBinding` binding in a configuration file. [!code-csharp[S_dualhttp#134](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/cs/program.cs#134)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求使用可靠傳訊，因此不像 的 建構函式那樣，有提供開關將它關閉的建構函式。Reliable messaging is required by the , so there is no constructor that provides a switch to turn it off as there is on the constructor for the . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何搭配安全性模式使用 `wsDualHttpBinding` 建構函式。The following example shows how to use the `wsDualHttpBinding` constructor with a security mode. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BypassProxyOnLocal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BypassProxyOnLocal : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.

value.span: 若要對本機位址略過 Proxy 伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果網際網路資源有本機位址，則此資源為本機資源。An Internet resource is local if it has a local address. 本機位址是指所在的同一部電腦、 本機 LAN 或內部網路，而且會識別語法上沒有句號 （.），例如 Uri"http://webserver/"和"http://localhost/"。A local address is one that is on the same computer, the local LAN or intranet and is identified, syntactically, by the lack of a period (.) as in the URIs "http://webserver/" and "http://localhost/". 設定 屬性即可決定以 設定的端點在存取本機資源時，是否使用 Proxy 伺服器。Setting the property determines whether endpoints configured with the use the proxy server when accessing local resources. 若 為 `true`，則對於本機網際網路資源的要求不會使用 Proxy 伺服器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 當這個屬性設定為 `localhost` 時，如果想要讓用戶端在與相同電腦上的服務進行交談時通過 Proxy，請使用主機名稱 (而非 `true`)。Use the host name (rather than `localhost`) if you want clients to go through a proxy when talking to services on the same machine when this property is set to `true`. 若 為 `false`，則所有的網際網路要求都會經過 Proxy 伺服器。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在組態檔中指定 wsDualHttpBinding 繫結。The following example shows how to specify the wsDualHttpBinding binding in a configuration file. 下列範例會將這個屬性設為表示應略過本機資源的 Proxy。The following example sets this property to indicate that the proxy should be bypassed for local resources. [!code-csharp[S_dualhttp#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_dualhttp#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/vb/module1.vb#6)] 這個屬性的值也可以在組態檔中設定。The value of this property can also be set in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxBufferPoolSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxBufferPoolSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可配置給訊息緩衝區管理員的最大記憶體量 (以位元組為單位)，這個訊息緩衝區管理員會接收以此繫結設定之端點處的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory, in bytes, that can be allocated for the manager of message buffers that receive messages at the endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 使用此繫結設定之端點所使用緩衝區集區的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for the pool of buffers used by an endpoint configured with this binding.

value.span: 預設值為 524288 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 524288 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用緩衝區集區將使用緩衝區的成本降至最低。The minimizes the cost of using buffers with a buffer pool. 當訊息從通道送出時，服務將需要緩衝區來處理訊息。Buffers are required to process messages by the service when they come out of the channel. 如果緩衝區集區中沒有足夠的記憶體可以處理訊息負載， 就必須從 CLR 堆積配置額外的記憶體，進而增加記憶體回收負荷。If there is not sufficient memory in the buffer pool to process the message load, the must allocate additional memory from the CLR heap, which increases the garbage collection overhead. 從 CLR 記憶體回收堆積所產生的大量配置表示緩衝區集區太小，而提高 上限來提供較大的配置便可改善效能。Extensive allocation from the CLR garbage heap is an indication that the buffer pool size is too small and that performance can be improved with a larger allocation by increasing the limit. 此處針對緩衝區大小所設的限制是為了讓訊息交換的效能最佳化。The limitations on buffer size set here are for optimizing the performance of message exchanges. 如果訊息超出設定的緩衝區上限值，訊息不會被捨棄。If a message exceeds the maximum value set for the buffer, it is not dropped. 相反地，系統會從 CLR 堆積要求更多記憶體，進而比使用緩衝區造成更多記憶體回收負荷。Instead, more memory is requested from the CLR heap and this incurs more garbage collection overhead than using the buffers. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 `MaxBufferPoolSize`。The following example shows how to set the `MaxBufferPoolSize`. [!code-csharp[S_dualhttp#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_dualhttp#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/vb/module1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxReceivedMessageSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxReceivedMessageSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可在使用此繫結所設定之通道上接收的訊息大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be received on a channel configured with this binding.

value.span: 由此繫結處理之訊息的大小上限，單位為位元組。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.

value.span: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務可使用 從網路收到的訊息大小受限於配置給各訊息的記憶體量，The size of the messages that can be received on the wire by services using the is bounded by the amount of memory allocated for each message. 這項關於訊息大小的限制是為了避免受到 DOS 型攻擊。This bound on message size is intended to limit exposure to DOS-style attacks. 請注意， 和 的設定是本機行為設定，Note that the settings for and are local behavioral settings. 表示這些設定不會以中繼資料的方式傳送到其他端點。This means that they are not transmitted to other endpoints in metadata. 當您從中繼資料產生服務的 Proxy 時，如果訊息大小上限為 2GB，則此 Proxy 的預設值仍為 64K，If you generate a proxy to a service with a maximum message size of 2GB from metadata, the proxy still has a default value 64K. 讓訊息和訊息緩衝區大小適當限制的控制落在本機系統管理員的管轄範圍內。This leaves control of the appropriate bounds for message and message buffer size in the scope of local administrators. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 屬性。The following example shows how to get the property. [!code-csharp[S_dualhttp#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/cs/program.cs#22)] [!code-vb[S_dualhttp#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/vb/module1.vb#22)]

span.span: The value is less than zero.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 指定複雜性條件約束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束包含最大項目深度和訊息內最大字串內容長度等項目，The complexity constraints include items such as a maximum element depth and a maximum length for string content within the message. 這些條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類別。The constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 `ReaderQuotas` 屬性。The following example shows how to get the `ReaderQuotas` property. [!code-csharp[S_dualhttp#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/cs/program.cs#13)] [!code-vb[S_dualhttp#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_dualhttp/vb/module1.vb#13)]
